author: Special Correspondent
text:
The personnel of the flying squad attached to the Salem West Assembly constituency on Monday seized cash Rs. 13.77 lakh from a two-wheeler rider.

The team was conducting surprise check of vehicles, when they intercepted the two-wheeler at Naalukalpalam village near Omalur.

Cash to the tune of Rs. 13.77 lakh were found concealed under the seat of the vehicle.

As S. Sivagnanam of Kandampatti, running a lorry shed in the village, and the pillion rider D. Ilango of Leigh bazaar area in the city, could not produce proper documents to the team, the money was seized.

Later, Ravikumar, Returning Officer of the Salem West Assembly constituency, deposited the money in the district treasury, official sources said.
title: Cash seized from two-wheeler rider
